content.raw:
I manually had to install the dependencies `joint_state_controller` and `position_controllers`. They should be added to the package manifest.

After that the PR worked fine for me and I was able to control the fingers with #!/osrf/srcsim/pull-requests/42/add-support-for-keyboard-teleop-the-hands/diff
content.html:
I manually had to install the dependencies joint_state_controller and position_controllers. They should be added to the package manifest.

After that the PR worked fine for me and I was able to control the fingers with #!/osrf/srcsim/pull-requests/42/add-support-for-keyboard-teleop-the-hands/diff
